title: Bill Graham Sweet Caporal JUST back from SGC
author: LACardsGuy

posts.post_title: Bill Graham Sweet Caporal JUST back from SGC
posts.post_content:
Was aggravated that this got graded as authentic because of factory size minimum, but it's not altered, etc. Card is SHARP. Gorgeous. I am pricing it higher than typical Authentics because of this. Please see images below. 

Looking for $149 net to me, including shipping.

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2qQgEWD][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54367504465_7757ad15b9_h.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2qQgEWD]graham front[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/190525740@N03/]Philip Golden[/url], on Flickr[/IMG]

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2qQgN3T][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54367528375_1ac38839f1_h.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2qQgN3T]back[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/190525740@N03/]Philip Golden[/url], on Flickr[/IMG]
